subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI, Sept. 18 (AP) — Sliding feet first, Lori Chalupny scored 57 seconds into the game — the second-fastest goal in the history of the FIFA Women’s World Cup.
snippet: SHANGHAI, Sept. 18 (AP) — Sliding feet first, Lori Chalupny scored 57 seconds into the game — the second-fastest goal in the history of the FIFA Women’s World Cup.
